name: Backlight
title: backlight.dev
shortDescription: Backlight is a comprehensive tool designed for front-end teams to create and manage design systems effectively. It caters to developers and is also appreciated by designers due to its integration capabilities, like the Figma plugin. Users can start from scratch or use existing templates to kick-start their design systems. An example use case includes a team rapidly developing a UI kit directly from code, ensuring consistency and speeding up the design process.
pros: Integrates with Figma for seamless design-code workflow
Visual pull-request reviews for faster validation
Live documentation and instant sharing features
cons: Primarily code-centric, which might intimidate non-technical users
Dependency on external design tools like Figma
May require initial learning curve for full utilization
